metadata.title: Friday, 27th October, 2017
metadata.session: SECOND SESSION OF THE TWELFTH ASSEMBLY

parts: (a) when the Government will construct a hospital in Ngabwe District; and
(b) when health posts will be constructed in the following areas:
(a) when the construction of the following health posts in Chifunabuli Parliamentary Constituency will resume:
(i) Nshungu in Kafumbo Ward; (ii) Kandolo in Masonde Ward; and (iii) Mwewa in Chinkutila Ward; and
(b) what the estimated cost of constructing each health post is.
